org.gillius.jalleg.framework.audio

Class LoopingSingleInstanceSample

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gillius.jalleg.framework.audio.LoopingSingleInstanceSample
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Beeper

    public class LoopingSingleInstanceSample
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Plays looping sample data with al_play_sample until a specified time.
